title: ImportExtern
content:
CommentComponent(kind=text, text=Represents an external value imported by a , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=WasmModule, value=kwasm.ast.module.WasmModule) CommentComponent(kind=text, text=. Its address will be used to populate a , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=ModuleInstance, value=kwasm.runtime.ModuleInstance) CommentComponent(kind=text, text= so that lookups happen correctly at runtime.

  1. Parse WasmModules
  2. Build ImportExterns from the modules' declared imports.
  3. Allocate the modules with their import externs.
  4. Using the allocations, update the addresses from the import externs appropriately.
